name: Drop Dice Merge: Puzzle Block
description:
Exercise your brain and become a merge master with Drop Dice Merge, the brand new match and merge puzzle game!

Drop Dice Merge is an addicted puzzle game. Just drop and merge 3 same dice , filling the dice with one touch, and merge dice and eliminating for high score.

This game is fun and strategic.
It requires the player to observe, judge, move, and finally merge 3 same dice or multiple same dice.
Eliminate golden dice and score, if you keep multiple streak and combos, you will get a high score.
If the player's dice reaches the top, the game ends.

HOW TO PLAY:
1: Moving the dice and Touch to drop.
3: When you match 3 same dice, it will be merged and scored.
4: Continuous merging will get extra score
5: The Golden Dice will eliminate the dice in 3x3 square.

Let Exercise the brain and make people smart.
